timeline.bodyText:
While I understand this space needs to be here, this should not be part of this PR. Please revert this change.
Changes should only be done which are in regards to the issue/change at hand.
timeline.author: ShaneBeee
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -571,12 +572,17 @@
 			.description("Called when a horse jumps.")
 			.examples("on horse jump:", "\tpush event-entity upwards at speed 2")
 			.since("INSERT VERSION");
-		if(Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))
+		if (Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))

replies.bodyText: Oops, you're right. Will be reverted.
replies.author: Romitou

timeline.bodyText:
in my opinion, "arm" should not be optional.
"on swing" is pretty vague.
In the event that in the future something else regarding "swing" is added, it could cause issues.
timeline.author: ShaneBeee
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -571,12 +572,17 @@
 			.description("Called when a horse jumps.")
 			.examples("on horse jump:", "\tpush event-entity upwards at speed 2")
 			.since("INSERT VERSION");
-		if(Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))
+		if (Skript.classExists("org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFertilizeEvent"))
 			Skript.registerEvent("Block Fertilize", SimpleEvent.class, BlockFertilizeEvent.class, "[block] fertilize")
 			.description("Called when a player fertilizes blocks.")
 			.requiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.13 or newer")
 			.examples("on block fertilize:",
 				"\tsend \"Fertilized %size of fertilized blocks% blocks got fertilized.\"")
 			.since("2.5");
+		Skript.registerEvent("Arm Swing", SimpleEvent.class, PlayerAnimationEvent.class, "[player] [arm] swing")
